channel.title: Notes on hello world

item.title: A Quick Note on Two Beautiful Websites
item.description: To me, the two most impressive websites based on blogdown are: Rob J Hyndman’s personal website. Live Free or Dichotomize by Lucy and Nick et al. I’m sure there will be more. An awesome tutorial on blogdown written by Alison. I have to admit this is the best blogdown tutorial I have seen so far. Note: I (Tanya) changed the slug and combined two of Yihui’s notes
